data.definition: the part of the body below the chest that contains the stomach, bowels, etc.
data.sentence: He was knocked over by a flying tennis ball that hit his abdomen at full speed.

data.definition: to take somebody away illegally, especially by using force.
data.sentence: He had attempted to abduct the two children.
The movement to abolish unreasonable taxes was successful.

data.definition: to shorten (a book, speech, or a film) without loosing the sense.
data.sentence: To abridge a book is a way of reducing its size.
The offense done by him is abhorrent.

data.definition: the act of not allowing yourself to have something that you want; the act of rejecting something.
data.sentence: He attempts to abnegate personal responsibility at the family meeting.

data.definition: a state of not happening or being used at present.
data.sentence: Hostilities between the two groups have been in abeyance since last June.

data.bangla_meaning: প্রতিরক্ষার জন্য গাছ দিয়ে প্রতিরধ গড়ে তোলা
data.definition: a defence made of felled trees placed together with the boughs pointing outwards.
data.sentence: The position of the army was strengthened by earthworks and by an abatis along the creek.

data.definition: the practice of regularly staying away from work or school without good reason.
data.sentence: Older workers have lower rates of absenteeism and more experience than younger folk.

data.definition: an edible kidney-shaped nut, rich in oil and protein.
data.sentence: The guest in the wedding ceremony was greeted with acajou and dates.

data.definition: an official decision in court that a person is not guilty of a crime.
data.sentence: The women felt their chances of acquittal were slim and that they were facing lifetime imprisonment.

data.definition: a very poisonous plant with purple flowers and black berries.
data.sentence: Do you know how many pharmaceuticals listed in the index contain belladonna?
